definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]

pinyin: Sha1 te4 A1 la1 bo2 ren2

sentences.english: She continued on to Riyadh and Jeddah in Saudi Arabia.
sentences.chinese: 接着，她先後訪問了沙特阿拉伯的利雅得和吉達。

sentences.english: In the end, a substantial transfer from Saudi Arabia closed the gap.
sentences.chinese: 最終，由沙特阿拉伯劃撥的大量資金彌補了這一差額。

sentences.english: The turning point in Saudi policy came in the spring of 2002.
sentences.chinese: 沙特阿拉伯政策的轉折點是2002年春天。

sentences.english: Saudi Arabian officials have not responded to the shootdown claim.
sentences.chinese: 沙特阿拉伯官員沒有對直升機被擊落的說法做出迴應。

sentences.english: Saudi Arabia tipped off U.S. intelligence about the parcels.
sentences.chinese: 沙特阿拉伯向美國情報部門通報了包裹的可疑之處。

sentences.english: This "Ship" is the Saudi Arabia Pavilion at the Shanghai World Expo.
sentences.chinese: 這艘“船”就是上海世博會沙特阿拉伯國家館。

sentences.english: The complete ommision of Saudi Arabia was a glaring oversight.
sentences.chinese: 沙特阿拉伯則直接被忽略了。

sentences.english: Saudi Arabia and Kuwait were bankrolling Iraq.
sentences.chinese: 沙特阿拉伯與科威特爲伊拉克提供現金。

sentences.english: Prince Turki has been the Saudi ambassador in both London and Washington.
sentences.chinese: 費薩爾親王曾任沙特阿拉伯駐倫敦和華盛頓的大使。

sentences.english: Saudi Officials began a swine flu vaccination campaign ahead of the Hajji.
sentences.chinese: 沙特阿拉伯官方在朝聖前進行了豬流感疫苗接種活動。

sentences.english: Abdelaziz Sager is the chairman of the Gulf Research Center in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.
sentences.chinese: 薩格爾是位於沙特阿拉伯的海灣研究中心的負責人。

sentences.english: This industry currently is not available in KSA.
sentences.chinese: 這一行業目前在沙特阿拉伯還不存在。

sentences.english: The central institution of Saudi Arabian Government is the Saudi monarchy.
sentences.chinese: 沙特阿拉伯政府的中央機構是沙特君主政體。

sentences.english: He also underscored the close partnership between the United States and Saudi Arabia.
sentences.chinese: 他還指出，美國與沙特阿拉伯有着密切的合作關係。

sentences.english: 5Saudi Arabian men ride on the newly-opened Holy Sites metro light rail in Mecca on November 2, 2010.
sentences.chinese: 沙特阿拉伯人乘坐新開通的麥加聖城地鐵輕軌。

sentences.english: Saudi Arabia consists mostly of semi-desert and desert with oases.
sentences.chinese: 沙特阿拉伯地形主要由半沙漠和沙漠綠洲組成。

definition: United Arab Emirates/abbr. for 阿拉伯联合酋长国

pinyin: A1 la1 bo2 Lian2 he2 Qiu2 zhang3 guo2

definition: nations of the Persian Gulf/Gulf states
